tool_description: Ranks and scores content performance based on multiple engagement metrics and custom weighting schemes.

content_items.description: Array of content identifiers to rank

weight_distribution.description: Weights for each ranking criterion (must sum to 100)

minimum_interactions.description: Minimum interactions required for ranking inclusion

error_messages: Insufficient content: At least 2 content items required for meaningful ranking
Invalid ranking criteria: Specified criteria are not available in the dataset
Weight distribution error: Weights must be positive numbers that sum to 100
Missing performance data: Content items lack sufficient engagement data for ranking
usage: Provide content_items array and ranking_criteria. Optionally specify weight_distribution for custom criterion weighting and minimum_interactions threshold.

total_ranked_items.description: Number of content items successfully ranked

performance_scores.description: Performance scores for all ranked content

ranking_summary.description: Summary of ranking methodology and key findings
